content: Execute Phase 1: Audit Scope Clarification - Analyze system boundaries and establish coverage requirements
Execute Phase 2: System Component Exploration - Comprehensive file system scanning and dependency mapping
Execute Phase 3: Violation Pattern Analysis - Multi-dimensional violation detection and categorization
Execute Phase 4: Audit Findings Presentation - Structure findings with priority matrix
Execute Phase 5: Remediation Strategy Planning - Develop ticket generation strategy
Execute Phase 6: Ticket Creation Implementation - Generate validated tickets for findings
Execute Phase 7: System Impact Management - Registry integration and dependency updates
Execute Phase 8: Audit Completion Validation - Verify success criteria and generate completion report
